name: Red Palito
description:
HOW TO PLAY
  • Move: WASD
  • Attack: Space
  • Shift: Next weapon
  • Pause: P
DESCRIPTION

Red Palito is a zombie survival game, so the objective of the game is to stay alive as long as possible while killing as many enemies as possible. It started as a side project to explore HTML5 games and the Three.js engine.

The main inspiration for the logic of the game is BoxHead, an old Flash game I used to play as a kid.

You can't win. You can only eventually loose.
